    • Uses of ConnectionConfiguration in org.jivesoftware.smack.tcp

      Constructors in org.jivesoftware.smack.tcp with parameters of type ConnectionConfiguration 
      Constructor and Description
      XMPPTCPConnection(ConnectionConfiguration config)
      Creates a new XMPP connection in the same way XMPPTCPConnection.XMPPTCPConnection(ConnectionConfiguration,CallbackHandler) does, but with no callback handler for password prompting of the keystore.
      XMPPTCPConnection(ConnectionConfiguration config, CallbackHandler callbackHandler)
      Creates a new XMPP connection using the specified connection configuration.
